ai-tha-ap304:1.3_0: to whom you gave upright ones,
ai-tha-ap304:1.4_0: like the most excellent of charioteers.
ai-tha-ap304:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap304:3.1_0: From here they are the fifteenth,
ai-tha-ap304:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap304:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sabbakāmī.
ai-tha-ap304:6.1_0: the most senior monk who loves all governments.
